product_name: Hi-Tec Trail Blazer Hiking Shoes - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and flexible, the Hi-Tec Trail Blazer Hiking Shoes for men take you from summit trails to crag approaches to mountain biking in comfort. Suede and mesh uppers are breathable and durable. Double-eyelet lacing system offers a secure fit. Moisture-wicking linings keep feet dry. Cushioning Ortholite(R) insoles deliver anti-odor and anti-microbial properties for all-day comfort. Additional EVA layer of cushioning is sandwiched between the footbed and midsole. Lightweight, durable high-performance fork shank ensures the right degree of flexibility and stability during wear. Hi-Tec Trail Blazer Hiking Shoes have rugged rubber outsoles for great traction on a variety of terrain. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and flexible, the Hi-Tec Trail Blazer Hiking Shoes for men take you from summit trails to crag approaches to mountain biking in comfort.
